languages.text: "Ответы Авеля могут быть энигматичны. Его разум устроен иначе, чем наш. Он мыслит гармоническими образами и обращает внимание на симметрии и соразмерности в окружающем мире. Ближайшая аналогия к тому, как он воспринимает реальность и взаимодействует с ней — поэзия".

"Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."
languages.original_text: "Ответы Авеля могут быть энигматичны. Его разум устроен иначе, чем наш. Он мыслит гармоническими образами и обращает внимание на симметрии и соразмерности в окружающем мире. Ближайшая аналогия к тому, как он воспринимает реальность и взаимодействует с ней — поэзия".

languages.text: 「アベルの回答は謎めいています。彼の精神は我々のそれとは異なる働きをしているのです。彼は調和の取れたイメージで思考しており、周りの世界の均整と比例関係を認めています。彼がいかに現実を知覚して関わっているのかを説明するには、詩的という言葉が最も近い」
languages.original_text: "Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."

traits.locale_text: 「アベルの回答は謎めいています。彼の精神は我々のそれとは異なる働きをしているのです。彼は調和の取れたイメージで思考しており、周りの世界の均整と比例関係を認めています。彼がいかに現実を知覚して関わっているのかを説明するには、詩的という言葉が最も近い」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “亚伯的答复可能不太清楚，他的思维方式与我们不同。他会基于万物的和谐性进行思考，注意周围世界的对称性与比例关系。如果要类比一下的话，他感知现实、与现实互动的方式非常类似于诗歌。”
languages.original_text: "Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."

traits.locale_text: “亚伯的答复可能不太清楚，他的思维方式与我们不同。他会基于万物的和谐性进行思考，注意周围世界的对称性与比例关系。如果要类比一下的话，他感知现实、与现实互动的方式非常类似于诗歌。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Abels Antworten können rätselhaft sein. Sein Geist arbeitet anders als der unsere. Er denkt in harmonischen Bildern und registriert die Symmetrien und proportionalen Beziehungen in der Welt um ihn herum. Die beste Analogie zu seiner Wahrnehmung und Interaktion mit Realität wäre Poesie."
languages.original_text: "Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."

traits.locale_text: "Abels Antworten können rätselhaft sein. Sein Geist arbeitet anders als der unsere. Er denkt in harmonischen Bildern und registriert die Symmetrien und proportionalen Beziehungen in der Welt um ihn herum. Die beste Analogie zu seiner Wahrnehmung und Interaktion mit Realität wäre Poesie."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les réponses d'Abel peuvent sembler énigmatiques, car son esprit fonctionne différemment du nôtre. Il pense en termes d'imagerie harmonique et décèle les symétries et proportions qui régissent notre monde. La poésie est sans doute l'analogie la plus proche de la façon dont il perçoit la réalité qui l'entoure et interagit avec. »
languages.original_text: "Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."

traits.locale_text: « Les réponses d'Abel peuvent sembler énigmatiques, car son esprit fonctionne différemment du nôtre. Il pense en termes d'imagerie harmonique et décèle les symétries et proportions qui régissent notre monde. La poésie est sans doute l'analogie la plus proche de la façon dont il perçoit la réalité qui l'entoure et interagit avec. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Las respuestas de Abel pueden ser enigmáticas. Su mente funciona de un modo distinto a la nuestra. Él piensa con imágenes armónicas y ve las simetrías y relaciones de proporción en su entorno. La poesía quizá sea la mejor analogía para describir la manera en que percibe la realidad e interactúa con ella».
languages.original_text: "Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."

traits.locale_text: «Las respuestas de Abel pueden ser enigmáticas. Su mente funciona de un modo distinto a la nuestra. Él piensa con imágenes armónicas y ve las simetrías y relaciones de proporción en su entorno. La poesía quizá sea la mejor analogía para describir la manera en que percibe la realidad e interactúa con ella».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Abel'in yanıtları muğlak olabilmekte. Zihni bizimkilerden farklı çalışıyor. Ahenkli imgelerle düşünüyor, dünyamızı şekillendiren simetrileri ve orantıları fark edebiliyor. Gerçekliği algılama ve onunla etkileşime geçme biçimi, en çok şiire benziyor."
languages.original_text: "Abel's answers can be enigmatic. His mind works differently from ours. He thinks in harmonic imagery and notices the symmetries and proportional relationships in the world around him. Poetry would be the closest analogy to how he perceives and interacts with reality."

traits.locale_text: "Abel'in yanıtları muğlak olabilmekte. Zihni bizimkilerden farklı çalışıyor. Ahenkli imgelerle düşünüyor ve çevresindeki dünyanın simetrilerini ve orantılı ilişkilerini fark edebiliyor. Şiir, gerçekliği algılama ve onunla etkileşime geçme biçimi için en yakın benzetme olabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
